summary: Well, as you're playing an RPG, you shouldn't be forced to do a quest. Especially one that wants you to kill a friend of yours!
descriptionHtml:
[b]About
[/b]This mod is but a script added to the end of the dialogue with one of Boethiah's Cultists. As that quest involves a moral question, and you're playing an RPG, you might as well have a "good character", one that won't make immoral choices... but you're usually forced to do that quest. Not anymore. Simply tell the Cultist "You'll do nothing of the sort", and the quest shall no longer bother you. You don't have to kill your friend anymore!

[b]Bugs
[/b]None. It should be compatible with any mod, unless we're talking about a mod that alters this quest.Â 

[center][b][i]Other mods of mine[/i]

author: thaalesalves
